attributes.title: teribble
attributes.review: i thought u know being the “great president” he is, his app would be amazing as well. well turns out the app is as good as his campaign. i opened it and saw a cheeto on my screen that startled me! when i got off the app my phone began to glitch! but as soon as i deleted it everything was fine again. do not recommend.

attributes.title: My wife left me because of this app
attributes.review: While I was buying my Donald trump swagerdice (swag merchandise) I walked in on my wife sleeping with her coworker, chad. Is it any coincidence that while I was on the app, my wife cheated on me. I think not.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!
attributes.review: I paid too much money for my iPhone for me to have an app cause so much trouble to my phone! Apple remove those app or lose an iPhone user FOREVER!

attributes.title: Ugh 😩
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible it’s very confusing on how to use. I would not recommend getting this app. ☹️

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app hijacked my phone, downloaded all my information, and sold it to Russia. Russia used this information to nursed my 86 year old grandmother. 1/10 would NEVER recommend! 🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗

attributes.title: Awful... just awful
attributes.review: Literally this app woke my baby up in the middle of the night because of the notifications and she would NOT go back to sleep. This app is ruining my  L I F E !!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: I honestly just think google should take this awful app down already

attributes.title: SELLS YOUR INFO TO ISIS?!??
attributes.review: I opened the app and saw my pet roach start to get frisky. I put it in the fridge so it could cool down, but when I came back to my phone, ISIS had texted me and said they knew I cuddled with boobs my stuffed bunny.
attributes.userName: a kid just trying to live

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this app is the WORSE i decided to get it to help learn about trump and next thing i know my pet dragon is going to DC and stealing trumps wigs. i personally apologize for my dragons behavior but this is the apps fault not MINE!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: This app is by far the worst thing I have ever downloaded on my phone! It makes me feel like a soggy ceaser salad. I’m all dressed up and this isn’t going anywhere ya feel me folks? 🤢🤢🤢🤢
